name: State of Alabama Department of Finance
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: State of Alabama Department of Finance is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Montgomery, AL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $6.8M in Medicaid payments across 25K claims.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $6.8M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
